entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
